Articles.Content:
In the old forum, you could use [goto] tags to link between lines of text in a post. Is there something similar here? It would really aid in navigating my mission report, and is something I used to rely on quite a bit.

 

EDIT: Answered.

Edited February 28, 2016 by Maximus97

Well, does it? That seems useful.

EDIT:  Use the share button in the top right of the post. I should think before posting!

Edited February 28, 2016 by legoclone09

No no, I meant to go to different lines of text within one post. I already knew how to link to different posts in a thread, I was just trying to refine it a bit further like one used to be able to do on the old forums.
